Name: aorta atresia
Definition: An aortic disease that is characterized by an absence of an opening from the left ventricle of the heart into the aorta.
Synonym: Congenital atresia and stenosis of aorta

Name: obsolete precocious puberty
Definition: An aortic disease that is characterized by an absence of an opening from the left ventricle of the heart into the aorta.

Name: aortic aneurysm
Definition: An aortic disease that is characterized by an enlargement (dilation) of the aorta to greater than 1.5 times normal size.

Name: aorta angiosarcoma
Definition: An angiosarcoma that is located_in the aorta.

Name: aortitis
Definition: A nephroblastoma that results_in an unfavorable appearance under the microscope. They are characterized by a cell nuclei that tends to be very large and distorted.

Name: aortic valve disease
Definition: An arthritis that is an autoimmune disease which develops due to an infection located elsewhere in the body.

Name: aortic malignant tumor
Definition: A vascular cancer that is located_in the aorta.
